name: melamine
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a chemical used in making plastics: Melamine is used to make plastic and in some countries as a fertilizer. Melamine was found to have contaminated some pet foods.
a type of plastic made using the chemical melamine: There were white melamine cupboards in the kitchen.
More examplesFewer examplesIt's unclear how harmful melamine could be if consumed by humans.A food plant halted production because of suspected melamine contamination.The items are made from durable, 100% food-safe melamine.The table tops come in toughened glass as well as solid wood and melamine. They were selling that melamine dinnerware that doesn't break if you drop it.
